title: (x) The Life Aquatic (with Steve Zissou) movie logo - Futura {Dav}
content:
anyone know the name or where abouts to get this font.

or a link to some good retro-ish similar styled fonts?

thanks
author: dougy

comments.content:

thanks
_( Just a note.: One could easily create such ‘outlines’ in every standard vector editing program.. )_
good point thanks. ill giver ago
Don’t forget to slip in some Arial.
